name: 陳鴻崑
objective:
本課程旨在幫助學生建立若干關鍵的企業財務概念。首先，我們將介紹資金的時間價值，這是財務學中最基本的構成要素。在資金時間價值的基礎上，我們將學習如何運用折現模型進行債券與股票定價，以及評估投資專案的價值。最後，我們將探討金融市場中的風險與報酬，包括投資組合理論、資本資產定價模型、資金成本以及資金募集。在這門課程中，學生將學習企業如何進行財務決策以及金融市場的運作方式。
This course aims to help students establish several essential corporate finance concepts. First, we introduce the time value of money, a fundamental building block in finance. We learn the bond and stock pricing and investment projects evaluation using a discounted model following the time value of money section. Finally, we discuss the risks and returns involved in financial markets, such as portfolio theory, capital assets pricing model, the cost of capital, and fund raising. In this class, students will learn how a company makes financial decisions and the operation of financial markets.

Week 14: Ch13. 報酬、風險與證券市場線 (1/2) / Quiz #4 on Friday
